songs.title: Faqeer (Thousand Thoughts)
songs.lyrics:
Adha Peer-Faqeer Adha Renda Sharabi
Na Mera Ra...Rah Mere Jheri Marji Khuda Di
Meinu Apnean Ne Luteya
Rabb Ne Bna K Es Duniya Ch Suteya

Koyi Kahwe Duneya Ch Qadar Ni Pyar Di
Koyi Kahwe Ve Duneya Khushean Mere Yaar Di
Vakhri Kahani Her Kise Di Jubani
Hun Rutt Ve Tufani Per Umeed V Bhaar Di
Koyi Kahwe Duneya V Rabb Di Awaaz
Koyi Kahwe Ve Duniya Ton Rabb V Naraaz Meri
Ikko Hee Aasra Rabb Sunle Awaaz
Sache Yaaran Da Saath Phanwe Din Ho Ya Raat

Uchiyan Gallan Socha'n
Akhri Main Ansoo Pocha'n
Mathe Ton Paseena, Menu Milean Haseena..
Nale Maar Sona-Chandi
Mere Yaaran Ney Bhang ...Piche Gharan De Ugani
Menu Rok Ke Dekhao

Khud Mere Ton Sikho, Menu Dassan Nu Aao
Cd Khareedo Hun Yaaran Nu Sunao
Vadde Gaddian Chalao, Base Khol K Bajao
Per Moka Jado Mile.. Duneya De Maleyan To Ho Jao Vaile
Udo Socho Ek Gal,.. Phela Masle Bnana Fir Maslean Da Hall
Sache Yaaran Da Saath... Jhoothe Yaaran Da Qatal

Ithay Cash Aety Aish.. Sare Paise De Pujari
Pai-Pai Ve Jind Main Batorde Guzari
Main V Duneya Ch Aya... Main Na Duniya Banayi
Raas Na Aye Menu Duniya Duhai
Hun Botlan Sharaab Diyan Sardka Te Doal
Jind Aye-Jaye Piche Rain Yaadan... Loki Bolan Rabb
Sunle Tu Sariyan ..Hun Aakhda Uthale
Lagda Ni Dil Meinu Vapis Bulale..Ve  Lagda Ni Dil Meinu Vapis Bulale
